Off Duty Well Site Important Safety Information Warning:\n\nDo not attempt to enter or change the device information or otherwise adjust the device while driving. Failure to pay full attention to the operation of your vehicle may result in death, serious injury and property damage. You assume full responsibility and risk for using this device and you are fully responsible for the safe operation of your vehicle and in accordance with all applicable laws. Firmware Update in Progress During the firmware update process, we recommend that you: \n- Do not power off the ELD or Mobile Device \n- Do not drive the vehicle \n- Do not disconnect or turn off Bluetooth \n\nWe\'re getting things started… We\'ll check to see if it\'s done in %1$d:%2$02d… We\'re checking if the firmware update has finished… The firmware update hasn\'t finished yet… \n\nThis might take a while… thanks for your patience. \n\nWe\'re still working on it… hang in there! \n\nWe\'re just wrapping a few things up… Finishing the firmware update is taking longer than expected. Do you want to stop waiting? KellerMobile™ Application Update Your version of KellerMobile™ is out of date.\n\nDownload and install the most current version to connect to your (NWF/JJK black box).
